name: Penguins pack
description: Three fully animated 2d penguin game assets. The download includes three animated penguins with animations idle, walk, jump, throw action, and fall back. Check out the snowball on the site if you need a projectile for the penguin to throw. As usual this game sprite comes with a fully rigged spriter file, keyframes and dissected png and vector body parts. I hope you enjoy using him in your projects.
